# The `LazyBlockFrequencyInfo` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Wraps a BFI to allow lazy computation of the block frequencies. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Wraps a BFI to allow lazy computation of the block frequencies.

A pass that only conditionally uses BFI can uncondtionally require the analysis without paying for the overhead if BFI doesn&#39;t end up being used.

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazyblockfrequencyinfo-h">LazyBlockFrequencyInfo.h</a>.
